title: Nature-Inspired Recycling of a Protein Mixture into a Green Fluorescent Protein-based hydrogel

Protein-based materials are biocompatible and have a variety of remarkable properties, consequently they are finding more and more applications. Nature recycles proteins in multiple ways, ranging from bio-degradation (a slow...
